entry.title: And So It Begins (again)
entry.content:
Welcome to my new blog Cocoa Nibs. I’m still getting things set up, so expect things to change around a bit while I get back into blogging.

I had a personal blog hosted on Blogger for a number of years, but it was strictly a friends-and-family thingâ€“not even indexed in Google. That was fine, but it wasn’t the sort of place where I could join the larger conversation.

I intend to focus somewhat on Cocoa development and related topics, hence the title. However, I’m terrible at staying on-topic, so there is sure to be other random stuff now and then.

So sit back, relax, and enjoy the flight :–)
